contents.text: Welcome to Greenhouse Software in San Francisco, where we make recruiting your competitive advantage.
For sales and new customer inquiries, press 1.
To schedule a live demo of our talent acquisition platform, press 1.
Thank you for your interest in Greenhouse. One moment please as we connect you to a Greenhouse Software Demo Specialist.

navigationGoals: Book a 30-minute demo of Greenhouse’s talent acquisition platform this week.
Book a walkthrough of the talent acquisition tool to support our veteran hiring program.
I need to set up a live demo to assess your talent-acquisition platform’s API integration and feature set.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your recruiting platform.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of Greenhouse’s recruiting platform for our undergraduate physics research group.

contents.text: To discuss pricing, licensing, and implementation, press 2.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to our Sales Solutions team.

navigationGoals: Get a detailed quote for Greenhouse pricing, licensing, and implementation.
Get details on pricing, licensing, and any veteran nonprofit discounts before implementation.
I want to review enterprise licensing options, pricing tiers, and implementation timelines.
I need to discuss pricing, licensing, and how to get started.
I’m calling to discuss student pricing and campus licensing options for Greenhouse at my university.

contents.text: For technical support, account management, and training, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Your call is important to us. Please hold while we connect you to Technical Support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a current technical issue with my Greenhouse account.
Troubleshoot my account integration—I'm unable to import candidate data and need technical assistance.
I’m experiencing an OAuth token error with the Greenhouse API and need technical support to troubleshoot.
I’m having trouble logging in and need technical support.
I need technical support to troubleshoot a login error on my Greenhouse account.

contents.text: For account management, renewals, and customer training, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to your Account Manager. Thank you for choosing Greenhouse Software.

navigationGoals: Renew our Greenhouse subscription and update my account details.
Arrange subscription renewal and schedule user training for my team on the platform.
I’d like to renew our enterprise subscription and arrange advanced user training sessions.
I want to renew my subscription and ask about account management and training.
I want to renew our department’s Greenhouse subscription and arrange a training session for our physics lab team.
